title: No coin today?
body: I'm just making sure I'm not blind or stupid for not being able to buy one of them coins today. Can someone confirm for me?

replies.body: Correct. You can only purchase them on days where games are actually being played.

You're not blind, there was no jewel purchase yesterday or today.  They're available during game days, but you can keep track by using the calander in our [Worlds 2016](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)  guide.  Hope that helps!

Full jewel calendar and explanations here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-
By coin I mean the jewel token. My brain shut down and I couldn't remember what it was called.
